attributes.action: Vet cabinet members, check if they have the skills necessary to do the job.
attributes.additional_details: We need people running this country, who have the British interests at heart, , and want this great nation to flourish .
attributes.background: To stop people holding positions of power when they have no experience of the subject matter.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a petition which clearly sets out how you would like Cabinet Members to be vetted.
